featured_tours.name: Goa Beach Paradise
featured_tours.summary: Relax on pristine beaches with water sports and nightlife
featured_tours.description: Experience the ultimate beach vacation in Goa with water sports, delicious seafood, vibrant nightlife, and relaxing beach retreats. Stay in beachfront resorts, enjoy water activities, and explore local markets.

faqs.q: Is the water safe for swimming?
faqs.a: October onwards is perfect for swimming with calm waters and pleasant weather.
Yes, we provide both vegetarian and non-vegetarian meal options.

featured_tours.meta_description: Experience Goa beaches - 5 days of relaxation and adventure
featured_tours.meta_keywords: goa tour, beach vacation, 5 days, water sports

featured_tours.name: Himalaya Mountain Adventure
featured_tours.summary: Trek through majestic mountain peaks with expert guides
featured_tours.description: Join our guided treks through the stunning Himalayan ranges with experienced trekkers. Explore pristine forests, alpine meadows, and breathtaking mountain views.

faqs.a: Moderate to high. Suitable for people with basic fitness levels.
Maximum altitude is 3,500 meters with gradual acclimatization.

featured_tours.meta_description: Himalayan trekking adventure - 6 days in the mountains
featured_tours.meta_keywords: himalaya trek, mountain adventure, trekking, himalayas

featured_tours.name: Rajasthan Cultural Tour
featured_tours.summary: Discover palaces, forts, and heritage sites of Rajasthan
featured_tours.description: Explore the rich cultural heritage of Rajasthan with visits to iconic forts, magnificent palaces, ancient temples, and vibrant bazaars.

faqs.a: We visit Hawa Mahal, City Palace, Jantar Mantar, and other major attractions.

featured_tours.meta_description: Rajasthan cultural tour - heritage sites and palaces
featured_tours.meta_keywords: rajasthan tour, cultural heritage, palaces, forts, jaipur

featured_tours.name: Kerala Backwaters Escape
featured_tours.summary: Cruise through serene backwaters and lush green landscapes
featured_tours.description: Experience the tranquility of Kerala's backwaters with houseboat cruises, local experiences, and Ayurvedic treatments.

faqs.a: Yes, all houseboats are equipped with life jackets and safety equipment.

featured_tours.meta_description: Kerala backwaters tour - houseboat and nature escape

featured_tours.name: Mumbai Coastal Weekend
featured_tours.summary: Explore the city's iconic landmarks and vibrant culture
featured_tours.description: Discover Mumbai's best attractions including Marine Drive, Gateway of India, and local markets with luxury accommodations.

faqs.q: What's the best time to visit Marine Drive?
faqs.a: Sunset time (around 6-7 PM) is ideal for the best views.

featured_tours.meta_description: Mumbai weekend getaway - city landmarks and culture

featured_tours.name: Ladakh High-Altitude Adventure
featured_tours.summary: Experience the mystique of high-altitude deserts and monasteries
featured_tours.description: Explore the rugged beauty of Ladakh with visits to ancient monasteries, crystal-clear lakes, and high mountain passes.

faqs.a: Yes, we recommend spending the first day in Leh to acclimatize to 3,500m altitude.
